job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Products and Technology Salesforce is the #1 in CRM in the world, and best known as the Customer Success Platform. As an industry leader in Sales, Service, and Marketing, we have some of the most unique data sets in the world. With our customers we are trailblazing new ways to bring AI to their customers. Whether itâ€™s Service Technicians triaging their most urgent support tickets, or helping Retailers build deeper, more personalized relationships with each customer, or helping sales teams prioritize opportunities and win more deals.  Salesforce is looking for data scientists with hands on experience transforming unique data to solve business problems. You will have access to high-value business activity data, including unstructured and semi-structured records around the sales process. You will participate in end-to-end business decisions using machine learning, from initial data exploration, proof of concept, to deploying repeatable solutions to guide our daily business decisions. You will be asked to experiment with state-of-the-art technologies and conduct research to create business impact throughout the sales process.  You will be working with other data scientists and engineers to build intelligent services for cross-functional teams We are a team with diverse technical backgrounds who share a passion for problem-solving, new technologies, and learning. We love to learn and teach and help each other, and we are looking for people with a collaborative attitude and openness to new ideas. Open to Fully Remote, Flex (1-3 days/week in the office), or Office-Based (4-5 days/week in office) If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form.
